title: Trump Media Company Names Devin Nunes as CEO
sub_head: Congressman from California is top Republican on House Intelligence Committee
body:
WASHINGTON—Trump Media & Technology Group said it had named Rep. Devin Nunes (R., Calif.), a longtime ally of former President Donald Trump, as chief executive of the social-media venture.
Mr. Nunes, the top Republican on the House Intelligence Committee, has told colleagues he plans to resign from Congress, a House Republican aide said. A spokesman for Mr. Nunes didn’t respond to a request for comment.
